name: Balloons for kids (itch)
description:
Popping balloons in this game, your kids will effortlessly teach numbers, letters, colors and animals. Learn to distinguish between emotion and develop fine motor skills and attention. The game has ten different, absolutely free level with four levels of difficulty. For kids there is a complete, professional voice. Leaderboards will allow you to compete with friends and good music and beautiful graphics will not give away from the game. Kids love to pop the balloons!

- 10 Free levels
- Professional voice
- Online leaderboards
- HD graphics
- 4 levels of difficulty
- Learn the alphabet and numbers
Game for kids and not only

XTRUN group
